title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 165.6 - Samples for grade and size determination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 165.6 - Samples for grade and size determination

State Regulations

Individual samples shall consist of at least 20 pounds. When the individual packages contain at least 20 pounds, each individual sample
is drawn from one package; when packages contain less than 20 pounds, a
sufficient number of adjoining packages are opened to provide at least a
20-pound sample. The number of such individual samples drawn for grade and size
determination will vary with the size of the lot. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
165.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
